Topic.Title: How to disable inventory/places Objects and Compas link ?

Posts.EditableText:
Hy, 
i'm working on the "online" version. I would like to unlink "#" target on the label 

I try this in a script "game"...
[code:12uj6jlq]eval ('$('#inventoryLabel.span.a').removeAttr('href');')[/code:12uj6jlq]

thank you in advance
Sebastien

PS I do not speak English very well (thank you google translate)
Posts.HTML:
Hy,
i'm working on the "online" version. I would like to unlink "#" target on the label

eval ('$('#inventoryLabel.span.a').removeAttr('href');')

Posts.EditableText:
Try this-
[code:1tdwtboz]eval ("$('#inventoryLabel.span.a').removeAttr('href');")[/code:1tdwtboz]

It uses " on either end rather than '
Posts.HTML:
Try this-
eval ("$('#inventoryLabel.span.a').removeAttr('href');")


It uses " on either end rather than '
